description: Select and activate the brush tool for painting.

userMessage.error: Unable to select brush tool. Ensure a document is open.

description: Set the brush size in pixels.

userMessage.error: Unable to set brush size. Invalid value provided.

params.paramDescription: Brush size in pixels from 1 to 5000. Default is 30.

description: Set the brush hardness for soft or hard edges.

userMessage.error: Unable to set brush hardness. Invalid value provided.

params.paramDescription: Hardness percentage from 0 (soft) to 100 (hard). Default is 100.

description: Set the brush opacity for painting transparency.

userMessage.error: Unable to set brush opacity. Invalid value provided.

params.paramDescription: Opacity percentage from 1 to 100. Default is 100.

description: Set the brush flow rate for paint buildup.

userMessage.error: Unable to set brush flow. Invalid value provided.

params.paramDescription: Flow percentage from 1 to 100. Default is 100.

description: Set the blending mode for brush strokes.

userMessage.error: Unable to set brush blend mode. Invalid mode provided.

params.paramDescription: Blending mode. Possible values: NORMAL, DISSOLVE, DARKEN, MULTIPLY, COLOR_BURN, LINEAR_BURN, LIGHTEN, SCREEN, COLOR_DODGE, LINEAR_DODGE, OVERLAY, SOFT_LIGHT, HARD_LIGHT, VIVID_LIGHT, LINEAR_LIGHT, PIN_LIGHT, HARD_MIX, DIFFERENCE, EXCLUSION, HUE, SATURATION, COLOR, LUMINOSITY. Default is NORMAL.

description: Set brush stroke smoothing for smoother lines.

userMessage.error: Unable to set brush smoothing. Invalid value provided.

params.paramDescription: Smoothing percentage from 0 to 100. Higher values create smoother strokes but with more lag. Default is 10.

description: Select and activate the eraser tool.

userMessage.error: Unable to select eraser tool. Ensure a document is open.

description: Select and activate the pencil tool for hard-edged lines.

userMessage.error: Unable to select pencil tool. Ensure a document is open.

description: Select the mixer brush for realistic paint mixing effects.

userMessage.success: Mixer Brush tool selected and ready.
userMessage.error: Unable to select Mixer Brush tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Wetness of brush from 0 to 100. Default is 50.
Amount of paint loaded from 0 to 100. Default is 50.
Mix ratio of colors from 0 to 100. Default is 50.
Flow rate from 0 to 100. Default is 50.

description: Select the clone stamp tool for duplicating image areas.

userMessage.success: Clone Stamp tool selected. Alt/Option+click to set source point.
userMessage.error: Unable to select Clone Stamp tool. Ensure a document is open.

description: Select the healing brush for seamless touch-ups.

userMessage.success: Healing Brush tool selected. Alt/Option+click to set source point.
userMessage.error: Unable to select Healing Brush tool. Ensure a document is open.

description: Select the spot healing brush for quick blemish removal.

userMessage.success: Spot Healing Brush tool selected and ready.
userMessage.error: Unable to select Spot Healing Brush tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Healing type. Possible values: PROXIMITY_MATCH, CREATE_TEXTURE, CONTENT_AWARE. Default is CONTENT_AWARE.

description: Select the patch tool for larger area repairs.

userMessage.success: Patch tool selected. Draw around the area to repair.
userMessage.error: Unable to select Patch tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Patch mode. Possible values: NORMAL, CONTENT_AWARE. Default is NORMAL.
Source or destination. Possible values: SOURCE, DESTINATION. Default is SOURCE.

description: Use content-aware fill to remove objects intelligently.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply content-aware fill. Make a selection around the area to remove.

params.paramDescription: Color adaptation level. Possible values: NONE, DEFAULT, HIGH, VERY_HIGH. Default is DEFAULT.

description: Select the dodge tool to lighten areas.

userMessage.error: Unable to select Dodge tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Tonal range to affect. Possible values: SHADOWS, MIDTONES, HIGHLIGHTS. Default is MIDTONES.
Effect strength from 1 to 100 percent. Default is 50.

description: Select the burn tool to darken areas.

userMessage.error: Unable to select Burn tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Tonal range to affect. Possible values: SHADOWS, MIDTONES, HIGHLIGHTS. Default is MIDTONES.
Effect strength from 1 to 100 percent. Default is 50.

description: Select the sponge tool to saturate or desaturate colors.

userMessage.error: Unable to select Sponge tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Sponge mode. Possible values: SATURATE, DESATURATE. Default is SATURATE.
Flow rate from 1 to 100 percent. Default is 50.

description: Select the smudge tool to blend and smear colors.

userMessage.error: Unable to select Smudge tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Smudge strength from 1 to 100 percent. Default is 50.
Start stroke with foreground color. Default is false.

description: Select the blur tool to soften areas.

userMessage.error: Unable to select Blur tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Blur strength from 1 to 100 percent. Default is 50.

description: Select the sharpen tool to enhance edge definition.

userMessage.error: Unable to select Sharpen tool. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Sharpen strength from 1 to 100 percent. Default is 50.

description: Load a brush preset from the brush library.

userMessage.error: Unable to load brush preset. The preset may not exist.

params.paramDescription: Name of the brush preset to load.

description: Open the Brush Settings panel for advanced brush customization.

userMessage.error: Unable to open Brush Settings panel.

description: Create a new brush preset from the current selection.

userMessage.success: New brush preset created from selection.
userMessage.error: Unable to create brush preset. Make a selection first.

params.paramDescription: Name for the new brush preset. Default is 'Custom Brush'.

description: Increase the brush size by a step.

userMessage.error: Unable to increase brush size. Maximum size reached.

description: Decrease the brush size by a step.

userMessage.error: Unable to decrease brush size. Minimum size reached.

description: Increase the brush hardness by 25%.

userMessage.error: Unable to increase brush hardness. Maximum hardness reached.

description: Decrease the brush hardness by 25%.

userMessage.error: Unable to decrease brush hardness. Minimum hardness reached.
